Type of Model Parameters

parameters_type.Rd

Type of Model Parameters

parameters_type(model, ...)

Arguments

model

A statistical model.
...

Arguments passed to or from other methods.

Value

A data.frame.

Examples

library(parameters)

model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Petal.Length + Species, data = iris)
parameters_type(model)
#>           Parameter      Type              Term     Variable      Level
#> 1       (Intercept) intercept       (Intercept)         <NA>       <NA>
#> 2      Petal.Length   numeric      Petal.Length Petal.Length       <NA>
#> 3 Speciesversicolor    factor Speciesversicolor      Species versicolor
#> 4  Speciesvirginica    factor  Speciesvirginica      Species  virginica
#>   Secondary_Parameter Secondary_Type Secondary_Term Secondary_Variable
#> 1                <NA>             NA             NA                 NA
#> 2                <NA>             NA             NA                 NA
#> 3                <NA>             NA             NA                 NA
#> 4                <NA>             NA             NA                 NA
#>   Secondary_Level Tertiary_Parameter
#> 1              NA                 NA
#> 2              NA                 NA
#> 3              NA                 NA
#> 4              NA                 NA

model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Species + poly(Sepal.Width, 2), data = iris)
parameters_type(model)
#>               Parameter      Type                  Term    Variable      Level
#> 1           (Intercept) intercept           (Intercept)        <NA>       <NA>
#> 2     Speciesversicolor    factor     Speciesversicolor     Species versicolor
#> 3      Speciesvirginica    factor      Speciesvirginica     Species  virginica
#> 4 poly(Sepal.Width, 2)1      poly poly(Sepal.Width, 2)1 Sepal.Width          1
#> 5 poly(Sepal.Width, 2)2      poly poly(Sepal.Width, 2)2 Sepal.Width          2
#>   Secondary_Parameter Secondary_Type Secondary_Term Secondary_Variable
#> 1                <NA>             NA             NA                 NA
#> 2                <NA>             NA             NA                 NA
#> 3                <NA>             NA             NA                 NA
#> 4                <NA>             NA             NA                 NA
#> 5                <NA>             NA             NA                 NA
#>   Secondary_Level Tertiary_Parameter
#> 1              NA                 NA
#> 2              NA                 NA
#> 3              NA                 NA
#> 4              NA                 NA
#> 5              NA                 NA

model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Species + poly(Sepal.Width, 2, raw = TRUE), data = iris)
parameters_type(model)
#>                           Parameter      Type                  Term    Variable
#> 1                       (Intercept) intercept           (Intercept)        <NA>
#> 2                 Speciesversicolor    factor     Speciesversicolor     Species
#> 3                  Speciesvirginica    factor      Speciesvirginica     Species
#> 4 poly(Sepal.Width, 2, raw = TRUE)1  poly_raw poly(Sepal.Width, 2)1 Sepal.Width
#> 5 poly(Sepal.Width, 2, raw = TRUE)2  poly_raw poly(Sepal.Width, 2)2 Sepal.Width
#>        Level Secondary_Parameter Secondary_Type Secondary_Term
#> 1       <NA>                <NA>             NA             NA
#> 2 versicolor                <NA>             NA             NA
#> 3  virginica                <NA>             NA             NA
#> 4          1                <NA>             NA             NA
#> 5          2                <NA>             NA             NA
#>   Secondary_Variable Secondary_Level Tertiary_Parameter
#> 1                 NA              NA                 NA
#> 2                 NA              NA                 NA
#> 3                 NA              NA                 NA
#> 4                 NA              NA                 NA
#> 5                 NA              NA                 NA

# Interactions
model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Sepal.Width * Species, data = iris)
parameters_type(model)
#>                       Parameter        Type              Term    Variable
#> 1                   (Intercept)   intercept       (Intercept)        <NA>
#> 2                   Sepal.Width     numeric       Sepal.Width Sepal.Width
#> 3             Speciesversicolor      factor Speciesversicolor     Species
#> 4              Speciesvirginica      factor  Speciesvirginica     Species
#> 5 Sepal.Width:Speciesversicolor interaction Speciesversicolor     Species
#> 6  Sepal.Width:Speciesvirginica interaction  Speciesvirginica     Species
#>        Level Secondary_Parameter Secondary_Type Secondary_Term
#> 1       <NA>                <NA>           <NA>           <NA>
#> 2       <NA>                <NA>           <NA>           <NA>
#> 3 versicolor                <NA>           <NA>           <NA>
#> 4  virginica                <NA>           <NA>           <NA>
#> 5 versicolor         Sepal.Width        numeric    Sepal.Width
#> 6  virginica         Sepal.Width        numeric    Sepal.Width
#>   Secondary_Variable Secondary_Level Tertiary_Parameter
#> 1               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 2               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 3               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 4               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 5        Sepal.Width            <NA>               <NA>
#> 6        Sepal.Width            <NA>               <NA>

model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Sepal.Width * Species * Petal.Length, data = iris)
parameters_type(model)
#>                                     Parameter        Type              Term
#> 1                                 (Intercept)   intercept       (Intercept)
#> 2                                 Sepal.Width     numeric       Sepal.Width
#> 3                           Speciesversicolor      factor Speciesversicolor
#> 4                            Speciesvirginica      factor  Speciesvirginica
#> 5                                Petal.Length     numeric      Petal.Length
#> 6               Sepal.Width:Speciesversicolor interaction Speciesversicolor
#> 7                Sepal.Width:Speciesvirginica interaction  Speciesvirginica
#> 8                    Sepal.Width:Petal.Length interaction      Petal.Length
#> 9              Speciesversicolor:Petal.Length interaction      Petal.Length
#> 10              Speciesvirginica:Petal.Length interaction      Petal.Length
#> 11 Sepal.Width:Speciesversicolor:Petal.Length interaction      Petal.Length
#> 12  Sepal.Width:Speciesvirginica:Petal.Length interaction      Petal.Length
#>        Variable      Level           Secondary_Parameter Secondary_Type
#> 1          <NA>       <NA>                          <NA>           <NA>
#> 2   Sepal.Width       <NA>                          <NA>           <NA>
#> 3       Species versicolor                          <NA>           <NA>
#> 4       Species  virginica                          <NA>           <NA>
#> 5  Petal.Length       <NA>                          <NA>           <NA>
#> 6       Species versicolor                   Sepal.Width        numeric
#> 7       Species  virginica                   Sepal.Width        numeric
#> 8  Petal.Length       <NA>                   Sepal.Width        numeric
#> 9  Petal.Length       <NA>             Speciesversicolor         factor
#> 10 Petal.Length       <NA>              Speciesvirginica         factor
#> 11 Petal.Length       <NA> Sepal.Width:Speciesversicolor    interaction
#> 12 Petal.Length       <NA>  Sepal.Width:Speciesvirginica    interaction
#>       Secondary_Term Secondary_Variable Secondary_Level Tertiary_Parameter
#> 1               <NA>               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 2               <NA>               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 3               <NA>               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 4               <NA>               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 5               <NA>               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 6        Sepal.Width        Sepal.Width            <NA>               <NA>
#> 7        Sepal.Width        Sepal.Width            <NA>               <NA>
#> 8        Sepal.Width        Sepal.Width            <NA>               <NA>
#> 9  Speciesversicolor            Species      versicolor               <NA>
#> 10  Speciesvirginica            Species       virginica               <NA>
#> 11 Speciesversicolor            Species      versicolor        Sepal.Width
#> 12  Speciesvirginica            Species       virginica        Sepal.Width

model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Species * Sepal.Width, data = iris)
parameters_type(model)
#>                       Parameter        Type              Term    Variable
#> 1                   (Intercept)   intercept       (Intercept)        <NA>
#> 2             Speciesversicolor      factor Speciesversicolor     Species
#> 3              Speciesvirginica      factor  Speciesvirginica     Species
#> 4                   Sepal.Width     numeric       Sepal.Width Sepal.Width
#> 5 Speciesversicolor:Sepal.Width interaction       Sepal.Width Sepal.Width
#> 6  Speciesvirginica:Sepal.Width interaction       Sepal.Width Sepal.Width
#>        Level Secondary_Parameter Secondary_Type    Secondary_Term
#> 1       <NA>                <NA>           <NA>              <NA>
#> 2 versicolor                <NA>           <NA>              <NA>
#> 3  virginica                <NA>           <NA>              <NA>
#> 4       <NA>                <NA>           <NA>              <NA>
#> 5       <NA>   Speciesversicolor         factor Speciesversicolor
#> 6       <NA>    Speciesvirginica         factor  Speciesvirginica
#>   Secondary_Variable Secondary_Level Tertiary_Parameter
#> 1               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 2               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 3               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 4               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 5            Species      versicolor               <NA>
#> 6            Species       virginica               <NA>

model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Species / Sepal.Width, data = iris)
parameters_type(model)
#>                       Parameter      Type              Term    Variable
#> 1                   (Intercept) intercept       (Intercept)        <NA>
#> 2             Speciesversicolor    factor Speciesversicolor     Species
#> 3              Speciesvirginica    factor  Speciesvirginica     Species
#> 4     Speciessetosa:Sepal.Width    nested       Sepal.Width Sepal.Width
#> 5 Speciesversicolor:Sepal.Width    nested       Sepal.Width Sepal.Width
#> 6  Speciesvirginica:Sepal.Width    nested       Sepal.Width Sepal.Width
#>        Level Secondary_Parameter Secondary_Type    Secondary_Term
#> 1       <NA>                <NA>           <NA>              <NA>
#> 2 versicolor                <NA>           <NA>              <NA>
#> 3  virginica                <NA>           <NA>              <NA>
#> 4       <NA>       Speciessetosa         factor     Speciessetosa
#> 5       <NA>   Speciesversicolor         factor Speciesversicolor
#> 6       <NA>    Speciesvirginica         factor  Speciesvirginica
#>   Secondary_Variable Secondary_Level Tertiary_Parameter
#> 1               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 2               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 3               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 4            Species          setosa               <NA>
#> 5            Species      versicolor               <NA>
#> 6            Species       virginica               <NA>


# Complex interactions
data <- iris
data$fac2 <- ifelse(data$Sepal.Width > mean(data$Sepal.Width), "A", "B")
model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Species / fac2 / Petal.Length, data = data)
parameters_type(model)
#>                               Parameter      Type              Term
#> 1                           (Intercept) intercept       (Intercept)
#> 2                     Speciesversicolor    factor Speciesversicolor
#> 3                      Speciesvirginica    factor  Speciesvirginica
#> 4                   Speciessetosa:fac2B    nested             fac2B
#> 5               Speciesversicolor:fac2B    nested             fac2B
#> 6                Speciesvirginica:fac2B    nested             fac2B
#> 7      Speciessetosa:fac2A:Petal.Length    nested      Petal.Length
#> 8  Speciesversicolor:fac2A:Petal.Length    nested      Petal.Length
#> 9   Speciesvirginica:fac2A:Petal.Length    nested      Petal.Length
#> 10     Speciessetosa:fac2B:Petal.Length    nested      Petal.Length
#> 11 Speciesversicolor:fac2B:Petal.Length    nested      Petal.Length
#> 12  Speciesvirginica:fac2B:Petal.Length    nested      Petal.Length
#>        Variable      Level     Secondary_Parameter Secondary_Type
#> 1          <NA>       <NA>                    <NA>           <NA>
#> 2       Species versicolor                    <NA>           <NA>
#> 3       Species  virginica                    <NA>           <NA>
#> 4          fac2          B           Speciessetosa         factor
#> 5          fac2          B       Speciesversicolor         factor
#> 6          fac2          B        Speciesvirginica         factor
#> 7  Petal.Length       <NA>     Speciessetosa:fac2A    interaction
#> 8  Petal.Length       <NA> Speciesversicolor:fac2A    interaction
#> 9  Petal.Length       <NA>  Speciesvirginica:fac2A    interaction
#> 10 Petal.Length       <NA>     Speciessetosa:fac2B         nested
#> 11 Petal.Length       <NA> Speciesversicolor:fac2B         nested
#> 12 Petal.Length       <NA>  Speciesvirginica:fac2B         nested
#>       Secondary_Term Secondary_Variable Secondary_Level Tertiary_Parameter
#> 1               <NA>               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 2               <NA>               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 3               <NA>               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 4      Speciessetosa            Species          setosa               <NA>
#> 5  Speciesversicolor            Species      versicolor               <NA>
#> 6   Speciesvirginica            Species       virginica               <NA>
#> 7              fac2A               fac2               A      Speciessetosa
#> 8              fac2A               fac2               A  Speciesversicolor
#> 9              fac2A               fac2               A   Speciesvirginica
#> 10             fac2B               fac2               B      Speciessetosa
#> 11             fac2B               fac2               B  Speciesversicolor
#> 12             fac2B               fac2               B   Speciesvirginica

model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Species / fac2 * Petal.Length, data = data)
parameters_type(model)
#>                               Parameter        Type              Term
#> 1                           (Intercept)   intercept       (Intercept)
#> 2                     Speciesversicolor      factor Speciesversicolor
#> 3                      Speciesvirginica      factor  Speciesvirginica

#> 5                   Speciessetosa:fac2B      nested             fac2B
#> 6               Speciesversicolor:fac2B      nested             fac2B
#> 7                Speciesvirginica:fac2B      nested             fac2B
#> 8        Speciesversicolor:Petal.Length interaction      Petal.Length
#> 9         Speciesvirginica:Petal.Length interaction      Petal.Length
#> 10     Speciessetosa:fac2B:Petal.Length interaction      Petal.Length
#> 11 Speciesversicolor:fac2B:Petal.Length interaction      Petal.Length
#> 12  Speciesvirginica:fac2B:Petal.Length interaction      Petal.Length
#>        Variable      Level     Secondary_Parameter Secondary_Type
#> 1          <NA>       <NA>                    <NA>           <NA>

#> 3       Species  virginica                    <NA>           <NA>
#> 4  Petal.Length       <NA>                    <NA>           <NA>

#> 6          fac2          B       Speciesversicolor         factor
#> 7          fac2          B        Speciesvirginica         factor
#> 8  Petal.Length       <NA>       Speciesversicolor         factor
#> 9  Petal.Length       <NA>        Speciesvirginica         factor
#> 10 Petal.Length       <NA>     Speciessetosa:fac2B         nested
#> 11 Petal.Length       <NA> Speciesversicolor:fac2B         nested
#> 12 Petal.Length       <NA>  Speciesvirginica:fac2B         nested
#>       Secondary_Term Secondary_Variable Secondary_Level Tertiary_Parameter
#> 1               <NA>               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
#> 2               <NA>               <NA>            <NA>               <NA>
